sources.note: Main vendor homepage. Describes OfficeEMR as all-in-one cloud EHR/PM/billing platform. Lists core specialties (nephrology, urology, ENT, ortho, neurosurgery, pain management) plus 45+ additional specialties. Highlights 98.1% net collection rate, single-login platform, mobile app, 48-state reach.

ONC mandatory disclosures page. Resolved to a navigation/table of contents page listing help documentation topics across billing, EMR, scheduling, prescriptions, telehealth, and compliance modules. No specific costs or limitations text visible â€” content appears in linked sub-articles.
EHI Export overview page in OfficeEMR help center. Lists export-related topics including single-patient and all-patient exports, export format definition, and references.
October 2019 press release announcing EverCommerce's integration of AllMeds and iSALUS Healthcare. Describes acquisition history, ENTChoice product launch, and new Knoxville TN facility.
2020 announcement of Brent Michael as new president of EverCommerce's combined healthcare technology division (iSalus/AllMeds).
EverCommerce's page about iSalus. Confirms parent company relationship and EverHealth division placement.
Third-party EHR profile. Describes OfficeEMR as full EHR/PM/billing suite for small-medium practices. Lists tiered pricing, deployment details, specialty support, and key features.
Third-party EHR directory listing. Shows 4/5 stars from 3 reviews. Lists features including eDocuments, iScheduler, Intelligent Intake, and specialty-specific modules.
Capterra listing showing 5.0/5.0 rating with limited reviews. Attempted access returned 403.
Crunchbase profile. Company founded 2000, Indianapolis IN. Acquired by EverCommerce in 2018.
2012 press release. St. Vincent Health (Indiana) partnered with iSALUS to offer OfficeEMR to independent physicians at discounted rate with 60-day go-live.

EHI Export references page listing data categories included in export: demographics, insurance, responsible parties, appointments, authorizations, emergency contacts, patient comments, vitals, allergies, problem list, prescriptions, progress notes, letters, eDocument metadata, patient communications, payer, fee schedule, claims, claim procedure lines, payments.
Help article describing CoverMyMeds integration for Real-Time Benefit Checks and Electronic Prior Authorization within e-prescribing.
